title: Truist Bank | Checking, Savings, Lending, and Financial Services
text: Truist One Savings Kick off tax season with a fresh gameplan. Your tax refund can go toward so much more. Drive closer to your savings goal line with Truist One Savings. Truist One Checking Fall in love with the way you bank. Enjoy no overdraft fees and perks that grow as your balance grows with us. LightStream Debt Consolidation Loan Low fixed rates. No fees. One payment. Consolidate credit cards and high-interest debt into one simple solution. Good-to-excellent credit is required. Get super-fast access to your accounts and bright insights into your spending with our mobile app. Scan this code with your phone’s camera to download Truist Mobile. Your guide to becoming a super saver When it comes to saving, it’s OK to put yourself first. Because when you build money habits that align to your unique goals, it makes for a smoother and more rewarding journey.
